C

checkBalance() - Method in class com.sda8.financetracker.app.TrackerApp
The checkBalance method prints the balance value from the trackerCore to the console and gives the user the option to Save and exit or return back to the main menu.

checkFile() - Static method in class com.sda8.financetracker.datastorage.Storage
This method checks that a datafile is usable by confirming if a file exists, and whether it is readable.
